definition: to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Hamlet decides to pretend that he is crazy to learn if this is true.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆雷特決定裝瘋，以探知事情真相。

sentences.english: Black nectar cannot be used for scrying or as a power component.
sentences.chinese: 黑色的花蜜無法用來探知也無法作爲法術材料。

sentences.english: in how to reach people and more numerous ways, so.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在探知人的心理方面，會有各種各樣的方法。

definition: to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
to spy upon/to lie in wait for (an opportunity)
to sense/to perceive/to become aware of/to detect
